DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates the efficacy of intravenous levosimendan treatment started during a coronary artery bypass operation to wean patients from a heart lung machine.
DOC.brief_title: Levosimendan Pretreatment for Weaning Patients From Cardio-Pulmonary Bypass
DOC.detailed_description: Levosimendan or placebo infusion is started at the time of induction of anesthesia.
DOC.criteria: Three vessel coronary artery disease. Indication for onpump coronary artery bypass surgery. Ejection fraction below 50% Indication for any cardiac valve surgery Previous coronary artery bypass surgery
